name: Modded Behavior
description: Override existing class behavior without replacing the original (damage, movement, stamina, etc.)

scripts.description: Centralized config constants — put all tuning values here so they're easy to adjust

instructions:
This pattern scaffolds a config constants class. You need to add the actual modded scripts yourself:
1. Use api_search to find the class you want to modify
2. Use script_create with scriptType 'modded' and the target class as parentClass
3. Reference constants from the {PREFIX}_Config class for tunable values
4. ALWAYS call super.MethodName() in overrides unless you want to completely replace the behavior
5. Use [Attribute()] for values you want editable in Workbench
6. IMPORTANT: modded classes apply globally — they affect ALL instances of the base class
7. Only ONE modded class per target class — do not create multiple files modding the same parent
